column2: 'As a culture, we are quick to use words that paint female sexuality as disgraceful - even if we do not realize that we are doing it.'-EveryDay Feminism We hate to tell you this, but we think you are doing that right now! Please check to see if this is the message you want to send.
column4: As a culture, we are quick to use words that paint female sexuality as disgraceful - even if we do not realize that we are doing it. -EveryDay Feminism We hate to tell you this, but we think you are doing that right now! Please check to see if this is the message you want to send.
